# TikTok Data Extractor

clockworks/free-tiktok-scraper

[Try for free](https://console.apify.com/actors/OtzYfK1ndEGdwWFKQ?addFromActorId=OtzYfK1ndEGdwWFKQ)

Extract data about videos, users, and channels based on hashtags or scrape full user profiles including posts, total likes, name, nickname, numbers of comments, shares, followers, following, and more.

## What does TikTok Data Extractor do?

This TikTok Data Extractor allows you to extract data about videos from the [TikTok](https://www.tiktok.com/) social media site. It gives you detailed TikTok information in structured formats such as _Excel, XML, HTML, JSON,_ and _CSV_ , which you can use in your own reports, spreadsheets, and applications. TikTok Data Extractor allows you to scrape:

  * Results from a TikTok **hashtag search**.
  * **Numbers** of comments and shares, followers and following, total likes.
  * **Individual posts** and **full user profiles** \- by using a URL for a specific profile or video.
  * Information about posts from keyword search queries. Moreover, you can download scraped videos directly.



## How to scrape TikTok with TikTok Data Extractor

If you've never done any web scraping before, don‚Äôt worry. TikTok Data Scraper is easy to use. Here‚Äôs how:

  1. [Create](https://console.apify.com/actors/OtzYfK1ndEGdwWFKQ?addFromActorId=OtzYfK1ndEGdwWFKQ) a free Apify account using your email.
  2. Open [TikTok Data Extractor](https://apify.com/clockworks/free-tiktok-scraper).
  3. Add one or more hashtags to scrape TikTok followers, videos and creators.
  4. Click the ‚ÄúStart‚Äù button and wait for the data to be extracted.
  5. Download your data in JSON, XML, CSV, Excel, or HTML.



If you feel like you‚Äôd enjoy more comprehensive explanation, try this [step-by-step guide](https://blog.apify.com/how-to-scrape-tiktok-tutorial/) or simply watch a quick [video tutorial](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=WwdmQzv_w54) on YouTube:

## Input

To start scraping TikTok, simply fill in the input form. TikTok Data Extractor recognizes the following input parameters:

  * **hashtags** \- scrapes TikTok for hashtags.
  * **profiles** \- scrapes TikTok profiles.
  * **search** \- scrapes specific keywords and extract videos and profiles that contain it.
  * **video URLs** \- scrapes specific TikTok videos.



Here‚Äôs a screenshot of scraping #funny from TikTok. 

And here‚Äôs the same, just in JSON.
    
    
    1{
    2    "hashtags": [
    3        "funny"
    4    ],
    5    "resultsPerPage": 100,
    6    "shouldDownloadCovers": false,
    7    "shouldDownloadSlideshowImages": false,
    8    "shouldDownloadSubtitles": false,
    9    "shouldDownloadVideos": false
    10}

## FAQ

### How much does TikTok Data Extractor cost?

TikTok Data Extractor uses the Pay-per-result pricing model, so your costs can be easily calculated: it will cost you **$4 to scrape 1,000 results** , so $0.004 per item. Apify provides you with $5 free usage credits every month on the [Apify Free plan](https://apify.com/pricing), so you can **get 1,250 results from TikTok Data Extractor for free**.

But if you need to extract data regularly, you should get an Apify subscription. We recommend our $49/month Starter plan ‚Äî that one could get you **over 12,250 TikTok Data Extractor results** every month.

### How can I use TikTok Data Extractor with the Apify API?

The Apify API gives you programmatic access to the Apify platform. [The API](https://apify.com/clockworks/free-tiktok-scraper/api/client/nodejs) is organized around RESTful HTTP endpoints that enable you to manage, schedule, and run Apify actors. The API also lets you access any datasets, monitor actor performance, fetch results, create and update versions, and more.

To access the API using Node.js, use the `apify-client` NPM package. To access the API using Python, use the `apify-client` PyPI package.

Check out the [ Apify API reference](https://docs.apify.com/api/v2) docs for full details or click on the [ TikTok Data Extractor API tab](https://apify.com/clockworks/free-tiktok-scraper/api) for code examples.

### Is it legal to scrape TikTok with TikTok Data Extractor?

Our [TikTok scrapers](https://apify.com/store?search=tiktok), TikTok Data Extractor included, are ethical and **do not extract any private user data, such as email addresses, gender, or location.** They can only extract what the user has chosen to share publicly. However, you should be aware that your results might contain personal data.

Personal data is protected by GDPR in the European Union and other laws and regulations around the world. You should not scrape personal data unless you have a legitimate reason to do so. If you‚Äôre unsure whether your reason is legitimate, consult your lawyers. You can also read our blog post on the [legality of web scraping](https://blog.apify.com/is-web-scraping-legal/) and [ethical scraping](https://blog.apify.com/what-is-ethical-web-scraping-and-how-do-you-do-it/).
